2+1.sig_info: When receiving damage that would knock her out, Death Touch is removed instead and Claire gains a Death Immunity Buff, preventing death and healing 5.49 to 18.83% of her max health over 4 seconds.

PASSIVE: Claire uses spells in her Basic Attacks causing them to deal Energy Damage instead of Physical.
CLAIRVOYANCE CHARGE - PASSIVE: Claire starts with 3 charges. Each time she or her Opponent are immune to any effect, she gains 1 charge and 4% of her max Power. Charges stack up to 20.
After landing or receiving a Light or Medium attack and the Opponent has 1 or more Buffs, a charge is consumed and 1 Buff is Nullified.
CURSE OF THE BLACK WIDOW: Claire has 3 types of curses each providing her with a different immunity, however only 1 curse can be active at a time.
By default the Curse of Blood is active. Landing a fourth Light Attack casts the next curse in the following order.
Curse of Blood: Bleed immunity.
Curse of Plague: Poison immunity.
Curse of Hellfire: Incinerate immunity.
When entering a new Curse any Bleed, Poison or Incinerate Debuffs that are Purified by the corresponding curse grant 1 Clairvoyance charge and 4% of Claire's max Power.
CURSE OF DAMNATION: Finishing a combo with a Medium attack inflicts 1 Debuff. Throwing a Heavy Attack or Special 1 inflicts up to 3 Debuffs. These Debuffs are determined by Claire’s active curse and last for 8 seconds.
Curse of Blood: Bleed, dealing 4.16 direct damage.
Curse of Plague: Poison, dealing 4.16 damage and reducing health recovery by 30%.
Curse of Hellfire: Incinerate, dealing 4.16 damage, removing Perfect Block Chance and reducing Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict the Opponent with Buff Immunity for 10 seconds. Decreasing to 50% against Science Champions.
Each hit grants an effect determined by Claire’s active curse.
Curse of Blood: Regenerate 35% of the damage dealt.
Curse of Plague: Steal 5% of the Opponent’s current Power.
Curse of Hellfire: Deal a burst of 83.2 direct energy damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: All Clairvoyance charges are removed, each increasing her Attack Rating during this attack by 20.8.
Claire gains Death Touch, lasting for 1.2 seconds per Clairvoyance charge removed, Death Touch increases the Potency of all Curse effects by 100% and is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.

CURSE OF THE BLACK WIDOW: Claire has 3 types of curses each providing her with a different immunity, however only 1 curse can be active at a time.
By default the Curse of Blood is active. Landing a fourth Light Attack casts the next curse in the following order.
Curse of Blood: Bleed immunity.
Curse of Plague: Poison immunity.
Curse of Hellfire: Incinerate immunity.
When entering a new Curse any Bleed, Poison or Incinerate Debuffs that are Purified by the corresponding curse grant 1 Clairvoyance charge and 4% of Claire's max Power.
CURSE OF DAMNATION: Finishing a combo with a Medium attack inflicts 1 Debuff. Throwing a Heavy Attack or Special 1 inflicts up to 3 Debuffs. These Debuffs are determined by Claire’s active curse and last for 8 seconds.
Curse of Blood: Bleed, dealing 45.44 direct damage.
Curse of Plague: Poison, dealing 45.44 damage and reducing health recovery by 30%.
Curse of Hellfire: Incinerate, dealing 45.44 damage, removing Perfect Block Chance and reducing Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict the Opponent with Buff Immunity for 10 seconds. Decreasing to 50% against Science Champions.
Each hit grants an effect determined by Claire’s active curse.
Curse of Blood: Regenerate 35% of the damage dealt.
Curse of Plague: Steal 5% of the Opponent’s current Power.
Curse of Hellfire: Deal a burst of 908.8 direct energy damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: All Clairvoyance charges are removed, each increasing her Attack Rating during this attack by 227.2.
Claire gains Death Touch, lasting for 1.2 seconds per Clairvoyance charge removed, Death Touch increases the Potency of all Curse effects by 100% and is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.

5+3.sig_info: When receiving damage that would knock her out, Death Touch is removed instead and Claire gains a Death Immunity Buff, preventing death and healing 5.49 to 25.07% of her max health over 4 seconds.
